item.content:encoded: No, Juiceglasses only affect limit. I know this for sure, as during my speedlooping I got a +6 limit for a total of 20 juices in one day, which was over my 18 tolerance, and my tolerance was not increased to match, leaving me 10 stamina down the day after.
